title: League wont launch
body: My windows 10 PC had an update. After the update when I try to launch league, it just says PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working.  Solutions????????????

replies.body: Your update may have changed your OS' security settings, so the patcher is being blocked from launching and resulting in this error.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get that fixed.  Let me know if you have any questions.
